summary: Ecosystem covers the concept of interconnected systems beyond just biological realms. In this context, it delves into how dynamic, non-hierarchical networks transcend geographical and temporal bounds. The focus is on the idea of 'ecosystem architecture,' which combines various disciplines to foster innovative and holistic organizational design. This page provides insights and resources to understand and implement these concepts, especially in technology and business.
excerpt: Ecosystems, traditionally bound to specific geographic areas, now metaphorically describe dynamic, non-hierarchical networks in business and technology, urging new practices like 'ecosystem architecture'.
